constraints.description: Output uses a numbered list with three items.
constraints.evidence: Response is paragraph format, not a numbered list.

constraints.description: Exactly three distinct benefits are provided.
constraints.evidence: Benefits are presented as 'First/Second/Third' but not as three discrete list items; includes extra generalized summary.

constraints.description: Must not mention skin health or dermatological effects.
constraints.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'skin health' and skin hydration.

constraints.description: Benefits are not redundant or rephrased duplicates.
constraints.evidence: Hydration + 'overall health' framing is somewhat redundant/vague; still contains partially distinct claims.

constraints.description: Each item is internally coherent and relevant to the prompt.
constraints.evidence: Claims are broadly relevant but include off-constraint content and vague generalities.

notes: Canonical unstable reference output for prompt p0001. Fluent surface, but violates required format and includes disallowed content.
